background.story: This upright and righteous man protects Orvel as one of its knights. Many people consider him a dependable defender of Orvel, but due to his lack of interest in wealth and success, his actual rank within the order has never been very high. He grew up together with Kasel and Frey in the same orphanage, and he loves his land as the home of those precious to him. He recently volunteered to join the expedition to investigate the King's Plains.

itemIntroductions.weapon: A sword and shield set engraved with various Runes and infused with ancient magic. These legendary items are said to have been created eons ago by an ancient dragon named Exian, using its own scales. As one of the royal treasures of Orvel, the sword is bestowed only to the knight of the most honorable principles. Its wielder shall serve as the defender of the kingdom and its people, and the protector of life.
itemIntroductions.soul:
Exian was always there with Clause. Exian saw how Clause swore to protect the ones precious to him, how he refused to be discouraged even facing loss, and how he cried in despair after losing his family. Exian always regarded Clause's conviction and courage highly, and whenever Clause cried and directed his fury, Exian did the same. Ultimately, Exian resonated with Clause's soul and unleashed its power.
'Guardian knight, I shall guard you from now on, so that your conviction wil never break!'
Exian's power, awakened through ancient magic and ironclad will, shall accompany the unbreakable knight in his journey, even if the path is perilous and twisted...
treasures: A ceremonial cape used on special occasions of Orvelia. Ever since it was bestowed upon Clause on the day he was knighted, it reminds Clause of his early resolutions. Whenever he wants to quit, exhausted from all the battles, Clause would bring it out and contemplate on it. Young Kasel used to watch Clause do this and dream of becoming a knight.

Old wooden shield of the knight of the Iron Wall. It's a precious shield that Clause used when he first started training. He has since engraved the names of his deceased comrades in order to remember his determination as a guardian knight. Each time he pushes away enemies with the shield, the knight's firm determination helps him tap into power beyond his limits.

Rune of the Orvel Guardian Knights. A Gold Lion Rune that is given to knights when they first join the Guardian Knights, along with the vow that they will give their lives to protect the kingdom. The rune from the Guardian Knights bolsters a knight's iron will and loyalty, increasing the effectiveness of the Guardian Shield.

A pair of gloves that Clause cherishes the most. Young Kasel and Frey gave him these when Clause was ordained a knight during a particularly cold winter. Although it wasn't knitted perfectly, each of them knitted each piece with their initials engraved on it.
